column1: karsyn joyce leggett| our sweet little angel karsyn joyce leggett was born june 12
column2: 2015 and returned to our lord on the same day. she will forever be cherished by her parents
column3: adam and samantha leggett; big brother jackson; grandparents
column5: randy and brenda temple and a large loving family. her tiny presence made a large impact on our family and we will always treasure and celebrate our special angel. a graveside service will be held at 3:00 p. m.
column9: at hillcrest memorial gardens in orange. officiating will be reverend tom phelan of st. francis of assisi catholic church in orange.
